Details

First Name Turai Last Name Yar'Adua Full Name at Birth Hajiya Turai Umar Musa iar'Adua Alternative Name Hajiya Turai Umar Musa iar'Adua, Turai Yar'Adua Birthday 26th July, 1957 Birthplace Katsina area, Nigeria Zodiac Sign Leo Nationality Nigerian Occupation First Lady

Hajiya Turai Umar Musa Yar'Adua (born 26 July 1957) is the widow of former Nigerian President and former Katsina State Governor Umaru Musa Yar'Adua. She was the First Lady of Nigeria from 2007 until the death of her husband, President Yar'Adua, on May 5, 2010.
